 @RequestMapping(value="/rest/stocks")
public class StockRESTController

    REST Controller to provide stock information of companies

    • Method Detail

      • listAllCompanies

        @GetMapping(produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<CompanyInfo>> listAllCompanies()
        Lists the names of all companies that are monitored with their last updated stock price
        Returns:
        - List of CompanyInfo objects which contains the company name, symbol and last updated stock price Internal server error if there was an exception while retrieving the data

      • getCompanyHistory

        @GetMapping(value="/{company-symbol}",
            produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<StockHistory> getCompanyHistory(@PathVariable(value="company-symbol")
                                                                                                                                                                 java.lang.String companySymbol)
        Returns the historical information of a company
        Parameters:
        companySymbol - - The stock symbol of the company. Example - Microsoft - MSFT
        Returns:
        A StockHistory object which contains the company symbol and List of StockDetailsDTO objects which contains the companies stock prices that are updated periodically Internal server error if there was an exception while retrieving the data
